title: If there is deep fake technology, might there be deeper real technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Deep fake” is called “Deep fake” because it is based on something called “Deep learning”. “Deep learning” is called “Deep learning” because it uses “Deep neural networks”. A “Deep neural network” is opposed to a classic neural network because it uses more hidden layers (making it deeper). There is no defined threshold for a neural networks being called a “Deep neural networks”. Usually something with 3 or 4 hidden layers is already called a “Deep neural network”. Some “Deep neural networks” use 50 hidden layers. They are still called “Deep neural networks”. Not “deeper neural networks”. But if you create your own variant of Deep fake with a bigger neural networks with more hidden layers, calling it “Deeper fake” would be a good idea.
